numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows the percentages of players of color in major sports leagues.
2. The graph also shows the percentages of head coaches of color in major sports leagues.
3. In these leagues, the percentage of players of color is high.
4. In these leagues, the percentage of head coaches of color is less than 40%.
5. There is a drastic difference between these two percentages.
7. The Women's National Basketball Association has 83% players of color.
8. The National Basketball Association has 83% players of color.
9. This percentage is the highest among the leagues in the graph.
10. The National Football League has 13% head coaches of color.
11. This percentage is the lowest among the leagues in the graph.
12. I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color is so low.
15. Racism is still part of major sports leagues.
16. People of color do not get the same opportunities as white people to become head coaches in major sports leagues.
17. The headline is: Lack of Diversity in Sports.
